name: Ricky
descriptions: Ricky is a Psycho addict and a compulsive liar who can accompany the Happy Trails Trading Company to Zion Canyon in 2281.
Ricky is a compulsive liar with a tendency to create incredible stories about himself, as he talks himself up to be a significantly greater adventurer and scavenger than he actually is.
He has in his possession a Vault "two-two" jumpsuit
Ricky appears only in the Fallout: New Vegas add-on Honest Hearts.

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: {Male PC}You looking for trouble, bud? I got plenty to spare, so watch your ass around me.

topics.topic_text: You're saying that you killed a Brotherhood of Steel Paladin?
topics.response_text: {you don't know what a "Paladin" is}What's it sound like I'm saying? If I was saying what you said I was saying, then yeah, I said it!

topics.topic_text: Please go on. This promises to be entertaining.
topics.response_text: I was walking along, minding my own, and up pops one of them Brotherhoods. He yells{imitate authoritarian voice}"Hand over that laser rifle, asshole!"

topics.topic_text: You do anything around here, besides talk too much?
topics.response_text: You want to know what I do, Bud? Anything I fucking want!

topics.topic_text: Too bad there's no such thing as an 11mm submachinegun.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] There so is! Or it was a 9mm{millimeter}or a 10, I don't know! Don't care!

topics.topic_text: Deadeye, huh? How did you get that nickname?
topics.response_text: {you stupid?}Uh, how you think? I shoot things in the eye, that's how good I am! Yeah, I'm that good!

topics.topic_text: That's quite a story.
topics.response_text: Hell yeah it's quite a story! But I'm quite a man, so stories like that follow me everywhere!

topics.topic_text: "Deathjaws," huh? Did you mean to say "Deathclaws?"
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED]{making it up as you go}No, no, you heard me right. "Deathjaws!" They're like Deathclaws - but bigger teeth!

topics.topic_text: What a load of crap. The eyeslits of T-series power armor are bullet-proof!
topics.response_text: {startled, no idea what you're talking about}Then I guess this dumb fucker's armor musta been... D-series or something!

topics.topic_text: Do you have any other special skills or abilities?
topics.response_text: {hostile}Well, I grew up near Dayglow out west, so yeah, I grew a third nut that glows in the dark!{chuckle}

topics.topic_text: I'll bring my tweezers and a microscope.
topics.response_text: Hey! That's - man, what a bitch! I was just being friendly!

topics.topic_text: Great, I'll see what I'm shooting at.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Hey! That's - man, what a bitch! I was just being friendly!

topics.topic_text: Ewww. I think I'll pass.
topics.response_text: I don't think so, honey! You won't be able to resist!

topics.topic_text: I see you're wearing a Pip-boy and Vault suit.
topics.response_text: {pissed off}Nice job, Eagle Eye! Of course I got a Pit-Boy and a Vault suit! So what?

topics.topic_text: Unwarranted hostility and general agitation. How long have you been a Psycho addict?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED]{defensive}Hey hey hey! Fuck you! I didn't say nothing about using Psycho!

topics.topic_text: Looks like you're traveling light. What would you say to carrying some of my stuff?
topics.response_text: [FAILED] Ricky travels light on purpose, asshole! If you're looking for a slave, ask someone else!

topics.topic_text: How much Psycho you got stashed away? If you run out on the trail... the withdrawal's not pleasant.
topics.response_text: Goddammit, I didn't say nothing about using Psycho!

topics.topic_text: I've got Psycho to sell, but it won't come cheap.
topics.response_text: {greedy, keeping voice down}All right, all right - I am a little light. How many hits you holding?

topics.topic_text: I can sell you a dose of Fixer, but it won't be cheap.
topics.response_text: Fixer? Never said I wanted to kick the habit!

topics.topic_text: Yeah, leave now. Before the withdrawal hits you out on the trail, no Psycho for miles.
topics.response_text: {pissed off}Fine! You win, asshole! Enjoy leading the expedition into a fucking ambush! Hope you all die!

topics.topic_text: One hit for 30 caps.
topics.response_text: One lousy hit? That'll cover me for an hour! Hand it over.

topics.topic_text: Two hits for 60 caps.
topics.response_text: Two hits? Ain't gonna last long. Fine, hand it over.

topics.topic_text: Three hits for 90 caps.
topics.response_text: Three hits? Like that's gonna hold me? Fine, I'll take them.

topics.topic_text: Five hits for 150 caps.
topics.response_text: That'll last me a while! Nice. Now take your caps and fuck off.

topics.topic_text: Ten hits for 300 caps.
topics.response_text: Ten hits'll last me a good while. Worth every cap. Now fuck off.

topics.topic_text: 80 caps.
topics.response_text: That much for a dose? Fucking robbery!

topics.topic_text: Never mind. It's your problem, not mine.
topics.response_text: Why'd you bring it up, then? When the withdrawal hits and I feel like killing something, I'll know where to start!

topics.topic_text: Never mind. Keep living the dream.
topics.response_text: That's right. Stick your nose where it don't belong and it's gonna get stung.

topics.topic_text: I'll give you 100 caps to make sure Jed lets me carry extra gear.
topics.response_text: You got a deal. You're lucky he trusts me.

topics.topic_text: I'll give you 75 caps to make sure Jed lets me carry extra gear.
topics.response_text: You got a deal. You're lucky he trusts me.

topics.topic_text: I'll give you 50 caps to make sure Jed lets me carry extra gear.
topics.response_text: You got a deal. You're lucky he trusts me.

topics.topic_text: Never mind, I don't want to spend caps on that right now.
topics.response_text: {angry}No sweat off my tits, asshole. Guess you better start deciding what gear you're going to leave behind.

topics.topic_text: Where'd you get the Vault suit?
topics.response_text: Where the fuck you think? Vault two-two! That's where I grew up!

topics.topic_text: What do you use your Pip-Boy for?
topics.response_text: Sorry, the shit I do with it is so far over your head, be wasting my time to put it in words you could understand!

topics.topic_text: Where is Vault 22 located?
topics.response_text: I can't tell you that! I have a sworn vow of secrecy, or something like that, to all the people I left behind.

topics.topic_text: I've heard of some strange goings-on at Vault 22. Know any details?
topics.response_text: I know everything! I know all about it! But I ain't about to tell the likes of you!

topics.topic_text: You're lying. I've been to Vault 22. No one's lived there in 150 years.
topics.response_text: {laughs uncomfortably}You been to Vault two-two, huh?

topics.topic_text: Did you notice I'm wearing a Pip-Boy, too?
topics.response_text: {you totally didn't notice, but pretend you did}Huh?{beat}...Of course I noticed! First thing I noticed about you!

topics.topic_text: I don't think your Pip-Boy works. I'd better go tell Jed.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Go ahead! Your word against mine, fucko! See what happens!

topics.topic_text: Your Pip-Boy isn't working. The screen's locked up, and the reboot button is missing.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Bullshit! Ain't nothing wrong with my Pit-Boy!{correcting yourself}I mean Pip-Boy!

topics.topic_text: I'm convincing, you're not. He'll believe me.
topics.response_text: Hey hey hey, why you got to go and be like that! Fuck!

topics.topic_text: Carry some of my gear, and I'll keep my mouth shut.
topics.response_text: {pissed off}I travel light on purpose, okay? But fine, I'll tell Jed I'm carrying less so you can carry more. What an asshole.

topics.topic_text: Vow of secrecy? Fine, forget about it.
topics.response_text: Forget it? Uh uh. Ricky remembers everything! But he keeps his secrets, too!

topics.topic_text: You're lying. You have no idea where Vault 22 is.
topics.response_text: {laughs uncomfortably}Well, yeah, okay. You caught me.

topics.topic_text: You're lying. You've never been to Vault 22.
topics.response_text: {laughs uncomfortably}Well, yeah, okay. You caught me.

topics.topic_text: I've got your number, that's all. Just wanted you to know.
topics.response_text: {unnerved, keeping voice down}Fine, just keep it to yourself, all right? Don't be such a fucking jerk about it.

topics.topic_text: Goodbye.
topics.response_text: {sneering}Yeah, whatever.

conversation.response_text: {High, recklessly shooting in all directions.}You want some, assholes? You just pissed off the wrong guy! And that means Ricky!
{Whimpering, cowardly trying to hide from incoming fire.}I don't deserve this! My Pip-Boy don't even work! Why the fuck you hire me?
{high on Psycho}Oh man, yeah! Trigger finger is feeling{emphasis}itch-ay!{yelling out to the canyon}Come on, assholes! Show yourselves and Deadeye Ricky'll blow your fucking heads off!
Don't worry,{mocking}Stella! This was my last hit, but thanks to ol' Johnny-come-lately over there, Ricky got some Fixer to take the edge off.
Dream on,{mocking}Stella. Ricky ain't about to die for nobody. Ricky's fucking in-vin-cible, yessir!{chuckle}
{going through withdrawal}I ain't feeling good, man. I feel like shit! I got the shakes, got the sweats. This fucking sucks!
{going through withdrawal}{sob of self-pity}You don't know how this feels, Stella! I'm sick! Never been so sick my whole life!
{self-pitying}You ain't got no heart, Stella! I swear, you're a monster, and you're gonna regret treating me like this!
